column5: It was slow day for sure but they were there. Some zooming by others searching for my rig. Actually the hari rig didn't work. Cause they weren't feeding agressively. I used the hair rig at the start and just got a quick tug and that was it. The corn was still on my rig. Thats when I went back to the oldfashion corn on a hook method. And it worked.     Even saw some messed up pike from the spawn. Sure hope its tail grows back!! Looks like mold had set in already.   The pike and carp are both swimming together in most places I saw today. Friends  dsn
Nice going and great pics, you showed us whose the carp master.  The bigguns should be coming soon and the action picking up.  Wait for that water to heat up a bit more.
Saw some movement today, should be out some time this weekend!!
If you want to take on the carp at the island let me know. I'll see when I'm available.    dsn
Nice shots, thanks for the report

Feed them bro. Give them some sweets to open up!!  Lets hear those funny reports again. The ones I found weren't inhailing the entire rig today. I guess they are just starting up. So a smaller hook and corn ( as much as you can fit ) directly on the hook did the trick.  dsn
wow! seeing these pics are getting me excited!! so they have started eating after the long winter months  i'll have to give it another shot tomorrow or sunday ... thanks for the report!

been going and feeding them at 2 spots the last few days... Sunday I bring my rods and I will have a full report!  have to say I am dangg pumped for carp fishing this year. All my musky friends do not understand..  just ordered an alarm!!!! and I sold some musky gear!!!  HELP! call that dude with the mustache, time for an intervention!!!
Good job DSN.  Can't wait for more of your carping stories. Might head down to the islands this weekend for a look.  007
Was gonna PM you on that spot.  Saw the same pike cruising the different pens down there.  Bizarre!
Thanks for the report and pic's...
Good to see the pike and carp living in harmony Nice carp catching!  cheers,  ehg
I tried to get a pic of pike swimmming with a carp but I wish my digtal was polarized.  dsn
Can't wait to try my first Carp ><
You'll have a blast and never fish anything else ever again. LOL Thats what happend to me. LOL
